title: Tapping Military Skills to Create Disaster Relief
itunes:title: Tapping Military Skills to Create Disaster Relief
description:
Jake Wood, Co-Founder and CEO at Team Rubicon, discusses how his military experience lead him to create a disaster relief organization that is helping in the fight against Covid. He also talks about his book "Once a Warrior: How One Veteran Found a New Mission Closer to Home."

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
